job_tasks.phrase: Applies existing machine learning techniques to new problems and datasets.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the application and adaptation of machine learning techniques to solve new problems, which is a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluates the outcomes and performance of machine learning systems.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating model performance is a critical step in the modeling lifecycle, ensuring the effectiveness and accuracy of the ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifies issues and recommends improvements to machine learning systems and the data they use.
job_tasks.justification: This involves diagnosing problems within ML systems and suggesting enhancements to both the models and their underlying data, which is part of the iterative modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs/scripts.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the fundamental activities of software development, including coding, testing, and maintenance of programs/scripts.

job_tasks.phrase: Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes adhering to engineering standards and using tools to build quality software, which is a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitors and reports on progress.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring progress and reporting are operational tasks, often related to tracking the performance and status of systems or projects.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifies issues related to ML development activities.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to pinpointing problems encountered during the ML development process, which feeds back into model refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Proposes practical ML solutions to resolve issues.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of solutions for issues encountered in ML, which involves applying ML knowledge and techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborates in reviews of work with others as appropriate.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions collaboration and reviews, which are elements of effective teamwork and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Elicits requirements for systems and software / ML life cycle working practices and automation.
job_tasks.justification: Eliciting requirements is a key part of understanding business or system needs and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Selects systems and software / ML life cycle working practices for components and micro-services.
job_tasks.justification: This involves making decisions about the technical architecture and tools for software components, a task within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploys automation to achieve well-engineered and secure outcomes. Systems integration and build
job_tasks.justification: Deploying automation and focusing on systems integration and build points towards operational and engineering aspects of making solutions production-ready.

job_tasks.phrase: Defines the ML modules needed for an integration build and produces a build definition for each generation of the solution.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of defining and building ML modules for integration, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Accepts completed ML modules, ensuring that they meet defined criteria.
job_tasks.justification: Accepting and verifying completed modules against criteria is part of the software development and integration process.

job_tasks.phrase: Applies existing data science techniques to new problems and datasets using specialised programming techniques.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about applying data science techniques to new problems, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluates the outcomes and performance of data science models.
job_tasks.justification: Similar to ML systems, evaluating data science model performance is a core modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifies and implements opportunities to train and improve models and the data they use.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves directly working on model improvement and data enhancement, which is central to the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Applies data engineering standards and tools to create and maintain data pipelines and extract, transform and load data.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions data engineering, data pipelines, and ETL processes, clearly defining this as a data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Supports monitoring of the external environment and assessment of emerging technologies.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring the external environment and assessing emerging technologies contributes to understanding the broader context and potential business applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to reports and road mapping, as well as sharing knowledge, involves understanding business strategy and communicating technical insights.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborates in reviews of work with others as appropriate.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes applying existing ML techniques, evaluating model performance, identifying improvements to ML systems and data, and applying data science techniques. It also includes core software development tasks for building and integrating these models, and data engineering for pipelines. There is no explicit mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or specific GenAI frameworks, making 'ML Engineer' the most fitting profile.
